So All May Hear

Faith comes by hearing, and hearing by the Word of God

Find out more

For Those Who Listen To Know

Our passion comes from Christ’s love for us. That love inspires us to tell others about Him. We believe everyone should be able to know about His love in their own language and in a way that is they can understand. Audio Bibles For Paraguay provides the recorded Scriptures in the Guarani Language, so that the families of rural Paraguay can listen to the Bible and know of Jesus’ love for them.

Join us in our passion!

Please Pray

Changed Hearts

The thing we want to see more than anything else are people who trust in Jesus for their salvation and live to follow Him.

Shipments

Completed paperwork for shipment, Safe arrival of AudioBibles from China, No problems with Paraguayan Customs

Distribution Teams

Pray for the saftey of the Paraguayan volunteers who travel many miles to the most remote parts of their country to give AudioBibles to those who need them most

Thanksgiving

Praise the Lord for all those who have prayed, given, and donated their time to this ministry
